# Product Overview

IsoFinancial-MCP is an open-source Model Context Protocol (MCP) server providing comprehensive financial market data for quantitative trading analysis and AI agent integration.

## Core Purpose

Delivers consolidated financial data through optimized meta-tools designed for LLM agents with iteration budgets. Replaces 10+ individual API calls with 1-2 consolidated calls, achieving 5-10x performance improvement and 70% token reduction.

## Key Features

- **Meta-tools**: Single-call retrieval of all financial data (company info, prices, news, SEC filings, earnings, short volume, Google Trends)
- **Multi-source data**: Yahoo Finance, SEC EDGAR, FINRA, Google Trends, RSS news feeds
- **Zero API keys**: All data sources use free/public APIs
- **LLM-optimized**: Token-efficient formatting, graceful degradation, parallel execution
- **Trading focus**: Short squeeze detection, earnings plays, momentum analysis, dilution detection

## Target Users

- AI trading systems and quantitative analysts
- LLM agents generating financial reports/newsletters
- Developers building financial analysis tools
- Researchers analyzing market data patterns

## Version

Current: 0.3.1 (Meta-tools release)
